title: Integrated Language Project Design: Online Capstone Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of language structure and intermediate-level language application skills
context.additional_context: Learners require experiences integrating holistic thinking through real-world language-based problem-solving. Utilization of platforms enabling real-time collaboration in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can integrate linguistic knowledge to produce project outcomes applicable to real-world contexts.
Learners can experience the process of improving language projects based on peer feedback and maintain a reflective journal.
Learners can employ online collaboration tools to devise team-based language problem-solving strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
